root.name: Qlione
root.description: Qlione Evolve is actually 2 games in one. The original Qlione uses a lives system and has you dropping explosive or vacuum bombs to create waves that crush enemies. Qlione 2 has an evolution system similiar to flOw that lets you upgrade to different forms each with a unique attack. You devolve as you take damage, and getting hit while in the basic form is a game over.
